titleStmt.title: The great duty of thankfulness a sermon preach'd at St. Pauls Covent-Graden, December 2d, 1697, being the day of thanksgiving for the peace / by John Hancock, D.D., Chaplain to His Grace the Duke of Bedford ; published at the request of some of the parishioners.
titleStmt.author: Hancocke, John, d. 1728.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound, print show-through, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
